sense.gloss: precisely, exactly, just, nothing but, neither more nor less

r_ele.r: たたかえばすなわちかつ

sense.gloss: to win every battle (that is fought), to be ever victorious
Chino Shōhō (Japanese religious group founded by Chino Yūko)
what will happen to everyone else if I am not the one who goes?

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑貴乃花↑↓たかのはな↓が↑急↑↓いそ↓いで↑体育館↑↓たいいくかん↓を↑出↑↓で↓てくる↑時↑↓とき↓、↑彼↑↓かれ↓をちらっと↑見↑↓み↓た。
sdata.e: I got a quick glimpse of Takanohana as he hurriedly left the gymnasium.

sdata.j: ↑花↑↓はな↓乃、↑嘘↑↓うそ↓↑泣↑↓な↓きはたまーにやるから↑効果↑↓こうか↓あるんだぞ。
sdata.e: Kano, pretending to cry has impact from being used sparingly!

sdata.j: ↑苦虫↑↓にがむし↓を↑噛↑↓か↓みつぶしたような↑顔↑↓かお↓で、↑綾乃↑↓あやの↓ちゃんは↑舌打↑↓したう↓ちした。
sdata.e: Ayano tutted, making a sour face.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らに↑言↑↓げん↓ひ↑給↑↓きゅう↓ふ『なにゆゑ↑臆↑↓おく↓するか、↑信仰↑↓しんこう↓うすき↑者↑↓もの↓よ』↑乃↑↓すなわ↓ち↑起↑↓お↓きて、↑風↑↓かぜ↓と↑海↑↓うみ↓とを↑禁↑↓きん↓め↑給↑↓きゅう↓へば、↑大↑↓だい↓なる↑凪↑↓なぎ↓となりぬ。
sdata.e: And he saith unto them, Why are ye fearful, O ye of little faith? Then he arose, and rebuked the winds and the sea; and there was a great calm.
